author: yorickdowne
content: Please join us on ethstaker discord; this is an r&d server

author: eaoe
content: Is there gonna be any update to the EVM in ETH 2.0, cause we need that

author: eaoe
content: optimization to gas usage by regular transfers and smart contracts

author: trent_vanepps
content: how can regular transfers be optimized?

author: eaoe
content: i am no expert at the level of Ethereum source code, i'm a smart contract abd sfotware dev, but for example Solana has made us look like kids, one blockchain that can forward 50k transactions per second with a block time in milliseconds, with no sharding or connected L2 solutions, i've heard cheapEth has optimized the Eth transfers, haven't looked much into it yet

author: eaoe
content: so if we want to put up a fight we need more than just sharding, we need to increase the capabilities of every shard

author: eaoe
content: ik we can't change block time

author: eaoe
content: that would fuck up almost all the smart contracts on ETH

author: trent_vanepps
content: solana has a completely different architecture with very different tradeoffs than Ethereum. this channel is not really the right place to discuss that though, let's move to <#595721451651465227>

author: eaoe
content: not much up for a chat jow was going to bed, but just wanted to state we need an improvement to gas consumption by transfers and contracts
